SEARCH
Package com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.Tags

Class TagsService

java.lang.Object
com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.Tags.TagsService
@Service public class TagsService extends Object
Service class for managing tag-related operations within the sports news platform. This class provides methods to perform CRUD operations on tags, leveraging the TagsRepository. It serves as an intermediary between the controller layer and the repository, facilitating the manipulation and retrieval of tag data from the database.

      Returns:

      public List<Tags> getAllTags()
      Retrieves all tags from the database.
      Returns:

    • getTagById

      public Optional<Tags> getTagById(Long id)
      Fetches a single tag by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tag to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found tag or empty if not found.

    • updateTag

      public Tags updateTag(Long id, Tags tagDetails)
      Updates an existing tag with new details. If the tag with the specified ID does not exist, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tag to update.
      tagDetails - The new details for the tag.
      Returns:
      The updated Tags entity.

    • deleteTag

      public void deleteTag(Long id)
      Deletes a tag by its ID. If the tag is not found, a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tag to delete.
